User story
As an exporter

I need to be able to see the fields which are required

So that I can ensure all required fields are completed

## Status: ✅ COMPLETED

Acceptance Criteria
## Scenario 1 - Remove optional labels and info message ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

When the page loads

Then the information text of 'This section is optional, except for the truck registration and place of unloading which are now required. All fields will become mandatory from 10 January 2026, under new EU regulations’ is removed.

And the field ‘Truck nationality’ does not contain ‘(optional)’ in the field label

And the field ‘Country of departure’ does not contain ‘(optional)’ in the field label

And the field ‘Where the consignment departs from’ does not contain ‘(optional)’ in the field label

And the field 'Departure date' does not contain '(optional)' in the field label

**Implementation Notes:**
- Removed `addArrivalTransportationDetailsTruckInfo` from translation files
- Updated `addTransportationArrivalDetailsComponent.tsx` to remove infoText for TRUCK
- Updated `transportationArrivalDetails.tsx` to conditionally render infoText
- Updated test expectations in `storageDocumentAddArrivalTransportationDetailsTruck.spec.ts`

 

## Scenario 2 - Error when Truck nationality not populated ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

When I have left ‘Truck nationality' blank

And I press ‘Save and continue’

Then I see a field-level error of ‘Select a valid truck nationality’

And the error is displayed at the error section at the top of the page

And the arrival transport document details are not saved to the application

And the 'UK arrival transport details' section on Your Progress is marked as 'Incomplete'

**Implementation Notes:**
- Added error `sdTransportTruckNationalityInvalidError`: "Select a valid truck nationality" (EN)
- Added Welsh translation: "Dewiswch genedligrwydd dilys i'r lori" (CY)
- Added test: `should display error when truck nationality is empty`
- Added handler: `TruckTransportSaveEmptyNationality`

 

## Scenario 3 - Error when Country of departure not populated ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

When I have left ‘Country of departure' blank

And I press ‘Save and continue’

Then I see a field-level error of ‘Enter the country of departure’

And the error is displayed at the error section at the top of the page

And the arrival transport document details are not saved to the application

And the 'UK arrival transport details' section on Your Progress is marked as 'Incomplete'

**Implementation Notes:**
- Added error `sdTransportDepatureCountryRequiredError`: "Enter the country of departure" (EN)
- Added Welsh translation: "Rhowch y wlad ymadael" (CY)
- Added test: `should display error when country of departure is empty`
- Added handler: `TruckTransportSaveEmptyDepartureCountry`

 

## Scenario 4 - Error when Where the consignment departs from not populated ✅

## Scenario 5 - Error when Departure date not populated ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

## Scenario 6 - All mandatory fields populated ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

When I have populated all mandatory fields

And I press ‘Save and continue’

Then I am navigated to /add-storage-facility-details

And the 'UK arrival transport details' section on Your Progress is marked as 'Complete'

**Implementation Notes:**
- Existing test validates this: `should navigate to storage facility page on click of save and continue button`
- Removed invalid test for empty values navigation

 

## Scenario 7 - Welsh Translations ✅

Given I have navigated to /add-arrival-transportation-details-truck in my non-manipulation document user journey

When I have selected Welsh language

Then the error messages are translated to Welsh

English text

Welsh translation

Select a valid truck nationality

Dewiswch genedligrwydd dilys i’r lori

Enter the country of departure

Rhowch y wlad ymadael

Enter where the consignment departs from

Rhowch o ble mae'r llwyth yn ymadael

Enter the departure date

Rhowch y dyddiad ymadael

**Implementation Notes:**
- All Welsh translations added to `public/locales-v2/cy/errorsText.json`
- Translation keys: `sdTransportTruckNationalityInvalidError`, `sdTransportDepatureCountryRequiredError`, `sdTransportConsignmentOriginRequiredError`, `sdTransportDepatureDateRequiredError`
